forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h, becoming WNW and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph, becoming WNW and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 55F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 11C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Becoming windy in the afternoon. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 53F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 45F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
